pageProps.title: Learning
pageProps.content:
#### Key principles
1. Create a learning plan. Find a mentor or at least a solid book (use Amazon rating).
2. Learn regularly. A good measure is 40-55 minutes session every day.
3. Try to use your knowledge or at least use [Feynman technique →](/notes/Feynman%20technique) and [Spaced repetition →](/notes/Spaced%20repetition).
